Remember, an issue is not the place to ask questions. If you have issues with the APIs or have a question about the Watson services, see [Stack Overflow](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/tagged/ibm-watson+unity).


Before you open an issue, please check if a similar issue already exists or has been closed before.

### When reporting a bug, please be sure to include the following:

- [ ] Start the title with the service name in brackets:  `[speech-to-text] websockets...`
- [ ] Steps to reproduce
- [ ] Expected behavior
- [ ] Actual behavior
- [ ] IBM Watson SDK for Unity version

### When you open an issue for a feature request, please add as much detail as possible:
- [ ] A descriptive title starting with the service name
- [ ] A description of the problem you're trying to solve
- [ ] A suggested solution if possible
